CodeList.Name: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported Version Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI1-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI1-Ability Do Same Things Friends Do
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - During the last week, how happy has your child been with: His/her ability to do the same things his/her friends do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Pediatric Parent-Reported Version - Ability Do Same Things Friends Do

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI1-Able to Do Activities at Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI1-Able to Do Activities at Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do activities at home.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Pediatric Parent-Reported Version - Able to Do Activities at Home

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI1-Able to Do More at School
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI1-Able to Do More at School
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more at school.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Pediatric Parent-Reported Version - Able to Do More at School

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more play or recreational activities (biking, walking, doing things with friends).

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - As a result of my child's treatment, I expect my child: To be able to do more sports.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Pediatric Parent-Reported Version - Able to Do More Sports

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: PODCI1-Bend Over and Pick Up Something
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PODCI1-Bend Over and Pick Up Something
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for your child to: Bend over from a standing position and pick up something off the floor?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PODCI Pediatric Parent-Reported Version - Bend Over and Pick Up Something

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - During the last week, has it been easy or hard for your child to: Bicycle or tricycle?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - Can your child participate in competitive level sports with other children the same age (For example: hockey, basketball, soccer, football, baseball, swimming, running [track or cross country], gymnastics, or dance)?

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument, Pediatric Parent-Reported - Can your child participate in pickup games or sports with other children the same age (For example: tag, dodge ball, basketball, soccer, catch, jump rope, touch football, hop scotch)?
